content: feather stitch wash cloth by carolyn calderon a textured thick washcloth pattern that is fun to make this is a yarn eater stitch and makes a reversible fabric perfect for a cloths scarves or a blanket pattern can be easily customized to be made bigger or smaller includes written instructions in us terminology please see pattern website for details and video tutorial thank you for your interest in my designs have a great day carolyn text and images c the purple poncho all rights reserved
